properties.entry: SELECT LIVESTOCK_NO, LIVESTOCK_SPECIES , LIVESTOCK_NM , LIVESTOCK_PRICE, LIVESTOCK_GENDER , TO_CHAR(DATE_OF_PURCHASE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') 구입일 FROM AR_LIVESTOCK WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ? AND LIFE_OR_DIE_FL = 'L' AND DELETE_FL = 'N'
SELECT MAX(LIVESTOCK_NO) FROM AR_LIVESTOCK WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO AR_LIVESTOCK VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), DEFAULT)
UPDATE AR_LIVESTOCK SET LIVESTOCK_NM = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_LIVESTOCK SET LIVESTOCK_PRICE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_LIVESTOCK SET LIVESTOCK_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_LIVESTOCK SET LIFE_OR_DIE_FL = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_LIVESTOCK SET DELETE_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ? AND LIVESTOCK_NO = ?
